body:
@haampie , need your inputs.. when trying to install, i see an error related to boost include headers..

In file included from /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-rocm-tensile-3.8.0-4zazgcse3gln27mrykm5l2bmekjp345o/spack-src/Ten
            sile/Source/client/source/DataInitialization.cpp:27:
  >> 203    /tmp/root/spack-stage/spack-stage-rocm-tensile-3.8.0-4zazgcse3gln27mrykm5l2bmekjp345o/spack-src/Tensile/Source/client/inc
            lude/DataInitialization.hpp:29:10: fatal error: 'boost/program_options.hpp' file not found
     204    #include <boost/program_options.hpp>
title: add spack recipe for rocm version of the tensile
